title.rendered: Rishabh Pant meets with a car accident on friday morning

content.rendered:
Cricketer Rishabh Pant was seriously wounded during an automotive accident about to Manglaur in Uttarakhand’s Haridwar district in the early morning of Friday. Pant was traveling in a Mercedes that hit a divider close to Manglaur once he was coming from Delhi. Ajai Singh, Haridwar Senior Superintendent of Police said. the driver of the car is claimed to have lost control of the vehicle. As a result, it hit the divider on National highway -58 of the Manglaur Kotwali area. (Read Also: Melbourne Cricket wants to conduct India vs Pakistan series of 3 tests on MCG)

Images of the cricketer’s car have in addition emerged on the internet however the automobile model remains unidentifiable.

Now as a result the vehicle has reportedly caught fireside before long once hanging the divider. Pant had previously purchased a replacement Mercedes GLC SUV which seems to be the equivalent model. Pant was rushed to a close-by hospital first so was remarked the inside track Hospital in Dehradun. Reports conjointly say that Pant had to interrupt the car’s glass to induce out. positive images also indicate that Pant had sustained injuries on his head, legs and burn injuries on his back.

The news has drawn reactions from several well-liked cricketers alongside former Bharat cricketers together with VVS Laxman. Who took to Twitter to post, Praying for Rishabh Pant. Luckily, he is out of danger.

A video of the incident has in addition emerged on cyberspace where pants automotive is seen gutted in flames.
